about_the_game:
The Luscious Secrets expansion provides new and unique content that will satisfy even the biggest fans of Tracy and Lisa. The new experiences are oriented around already-established characters you love, and what's more, we're introducing some new temptations that Justin can pursue.

TRACY


As Justin's wife, she plays a massive role in his life and in this expansion. We all know she likes to experiment with new sensual experiences, and this time, inspired by Justin, she is open to a lesbian adventure with Coco from the sex shop. Also, for the hotwife and cuckold fans who like to see Tracy be so naughty it's practically evil, we've got splendid news - Daniel will come back for a couple of new scenes with Justin's wife. Of course, pushing Tracy in that direction will be optional, so don't worry if you're not keen on seeing your beloved one being slutty with other men. Additionally, you can visit Tracy at work, flirt with her in her sexy business outfit, and have sneaky sex in her office.

DANIEL


Daniel is moving to Canada, and he got the last evening he could spend with his friends. It's up to you if he is going to dine with Tracy alone, while Justin is waiting for them in his home office or if the 3 of them will spend some fancy time in the restaurant, which could end with a breathtaking threesome or even... a foursome including eager waitress.

LISA


For this redheaded young lady from Canada, we've designed new sex scenes that become available when your relationship with her is high enough. Prepare for some ultra-hot weekends with your babysitter. Take her in the kitchen, living room, and garden or witness a fabulous fashion show in her bedroom. She may look innocent but her desires are very naughty. When Tracy is away at the cabin, Lisa can sleep in your bed. Will you just let her rest there or are you going to take advantage of the situation and be intimate with her on your wife's bed?

KEIKO


Tracy may have a hard time working with her beautiful Asian administrative assistant, but Justin gets along with Keiko without any problems. In this new section of the story, Justin is able to spend even more time with her, trying to win her over while Tracy isn't around. He tries in the office, in the breakroom, in the elevator, at the mall and even when they're alone in his car. Can he withstand her alluring charm, stunning figure and beguiling grin? It's up to you.

SANDY


Lisa's slutty best friend works at the club and is ready for more hot scenes. Now Justin can stay after hours in the club for some fun with her hot young body and lusty attitude. And I need to admit she loves being laid. After the intimate moment between you and Sandy at the club, she can bring you back to her home where... her husband is already there. Do you have the nerve to make love to her in front of him? Would you let him join in?


HANNAH


We introduce a brand new character with this expansion. She is Lisa's childhood friend from Canada who has moved to Los Angeles to be a movie star. She has spent a lot of money to upgrade her boobs, and Lisa disapproves. Hannah is trying to earn money as an Instagram model, and working part-time as a hairdresser at the mall. She loves to tease and provoke. If Justin plays it smart, she is ready to offer him everything.

COCO


Yes, this beauty is into girls (and more). If Justin inspires Tracy with erotic toys and organizes a chance for Tracy and Coco to meet, sparks will fly. Experience an intense evening with the two ladies as they pleasure each other in front of you. And who knows, maybe you will be able to join them when they are done...

LIBRARY GIRLS


Do you recall the ladies from the library? They admire Justin’s work and were keen to get to know him better. Beware: this could have repercussions, influencing the event of the night when Tracy, Justin, and Daniel are going crazy.

content_descriptors.notes: Sexual scenes between adults featuring men and women, women with other women, multiple partner
